entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC - Relax restrictions on record parameter names matching #55732
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, 17.0
  • NRE from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.GenerateMember.GenerateConstructor.AbstractGenerateConstructorService`2.GenerateConstructorAsync #55731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Re-enable test CommandLineTests.ReservedDeviceNameAsFileName #55730
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test, untriaged, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Separate global options and solution options #55728
    Area-IDE, Concept-OOP, untriaged, Backlog
  • 'for' completion item has inaccurate tooltip description #55734
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Re-enable CsiScript_WithSourceCodeRedirectedViaStandardInput_ExecutesNonInteractively #55727
    Area-Interactive, Disabled Test, untriaged, Infraswat
  • `JsonSourceGenerator` is Executing in Both `ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe` and `devenv.exe` #55723
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Concept-OOP, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Exhaustiveness check quacked on nested deconstruction #55719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Closed

  • CompilerGeneratedAttribute not applied to all generated functions #55697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Source Generator should generate source code that is usable by projects that reference the source generator project. #55688
    Resolution-Duplicate, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • AD0001: Could not resolve type with token 01000094 from typeref (expected class 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.BaseParameterSyntax #55708
    Question, Area-Analyzers, Resolution-Answered, 17.0
  • Allow to configure spacing around unary operators for Code Style rules in .editorconfig #55721
    Resolution-Duplicate, Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • Concatenated strings created with string interpolation cause inserted values to jump to the beginning #55720
    Resolution-Duplicate, untriaged
  • The .editorconfig option csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent must respect built-in types #55722
    Resolution-Duplicate, Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • Inheritance Margin Icons are too small #53401
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • [CallerArgumentExpression] attribute works with any language version, changing behavior of existing code on compiler update #55695
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design, 17.0

Updated

  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK for Roslyn development #55680
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Syntax API for FileScopedNamespaces #54674
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, api-approved, blocking, New Language Feature - File Scoped Namespaces, 17.0
  • Import completion might benifit from persisting data to disk and pre-calculation #37197
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Concept-Continuous Improvement, IDE-IntelliSense, 17.0
  • [Test Plan] Interpolated String Improvements #51499
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Dev17 IDE Priority, 17.0
  • NormalizeWhitespace causes error on XML comments #47278
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • The compiler should include the URL in the command line output #47310
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Concept-Diagnostic Clarity, 17.1
  • Public API to determine if method is an extended partial method #47817
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, 17.1
  • IOperation support for interpolated string handler conversions #54718
    Area-Analyzers, Concept-API, Feature Request, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, api-needs-work, blocking, 17.0
  • Internal modifier added to partial classes breaks new project creation for WinForms, WebTools and anything using partial classes in their templates #55703
    Bug, Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Urgency-Soon, Disabled Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Re-enable MetadataReference integration test #55711
    Area-IDE, Disabled Test, Integration-Test, untriaged, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Higher Level SyntaxProvider APIs for incremental generators #54725
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, New Feature - Source Generators, api-ready-for-review, 17.0
  • "Rename" doesn't rename the type in a comment if I have check "Include Comments" #54294
    Bug, Area-IDE, Developer Community, 17.0
  • Preview Changes when renaming C# elements from Razor #55516
    Bug, Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Bulk severity configuration in .editorconfig should be applied to "disabled by default" analyzers #47046
    Area-Analyzers, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • BUG: closure is created for (this) when nameof() is referencing a member #53591
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 4 - In Review, Developer Community, IDE-IntelliSense, 17.0
  • Introduce local doesn't use var keyword #55698
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Resolution-Not Reproducible, Investigation Required, 17.0
  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, 17.0
  • Add option to disable graphical .editorconfig UI #54925
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Developer Community, Feature - Editor Config UI, 17.0
  • String interpolation produces incorrect output for concatenated strings #55569
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • EnC - Allow changing names of previously synthesized record member parameters #55739
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main into main-vs-deps #55738
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Add a preview option for ServiceHub Core host #55736
    Area-IDE
  • Warm up ImportCompletion cache in background when opening a document #55729
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/dibarbet/update sdk2 #55726
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dev/dibarbet/update sdk #55725
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Region analysis of nameof #55724
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC - Parameterless struct constructors #55718
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC
  • IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55717
    Area-Interactive
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0

Merged

  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • 🐛 Implement PackageSettingsPersister.TryFetch #55709
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow the integration CI pipeline to specify a build pool #55735
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • 🐇 Store weak references in s_structuresTable #55344
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55743
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55742
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55741
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update to latest async lightbulb api #55207
    Area-IDE
  • Don't add accessibility modifiers to partial classes in new documents #55713
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • Specify paths and shell on Windows #55694
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously (part 2) #55687
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55682
    Area-IDE
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Reference refactoring and imports #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Have inheritance-margin hold onto data that does *not* point back at Solution instances. #55696
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature to simplify code to use the new extended property patterns when available. #55704
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Use directory-scoped ALCs to load analyzers in .NET Core #55098
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Options refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE
  • Extract local function: Variable shadowing prior CSharp 8 #55135
    Area-IDE, Community
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Disallow nullable suppression in patterns #54072
    Area-Compilers
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extract class bug #55648
    Area-IDE
  • Change Inheritance Margin Header style #55533
    Area-IDE
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
